summary: Revamp and rebuild Glitchip Technologies Pvt. Ltd. marketing website with modern design, transitions/assets, key pages (Home, Services, Products, Careers, Why Us) and prepare deployment + connection to the existing GoDaddy domain.
architectural_notes: Domain connection approach: keep domain registered at GoDaddy, use Cloudflare for DNS management to point domain to the deployed site.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Semiconductor chip/circuit hero illustration with abstract geometry, dark background, teal accents (glitchip-hero.dim_1920x1080.png)
- Set of five line icons representing: Physical Design, Design Verification, DFT, AI Automation, RTL Engineering (glitchip-service-icons.dim_512x512.png)
- Abstract circuit-board pattern background, seamless or large canvas (glitchip-circuit-pattern.dim_2048x2048.png)
- Careers illustration showing a futuristic workstation/engineering theme (glitchip-careers-illustration.dim_1600x900.png)
- Why Us infographic-style illustration with pillars/process motif (glitchip-whyus-illustration.dim_1600x900.png)

existing_features.title: Create a full multi-page marketing website for "Glitchip Technologies Pvt. Ltd." with the following top-level pages and routes: Home (/), Services (/services), Why Us (/why-us), Products (/products), Careers (/careers), and Contact (/contact).

Implement a global header and footer that appear on all main and subpages, including: primary navigation, prominent "Get in touch" CTA, social links placeholders, company name, and a compact services list in the footer.

Apply the provided company logo image (IMG-20250404-WA0002.png) as the primary brand mark across the site (header, footer, favicon/app icon where applicable), ensuring it displays crisply on light and dark backgrounds.

Build a high-impact Home page with crystal-clear VLSI-focused messaging and sections such as: hero (headline + subheadline + CTA), services overview, differentiators teaser (Why Us), highlight stats/capabilities, and a final CTA section. Use relevant high-quality visuals and illustrations.

Create a Services page featuring exactly these offerings: Physical Design, Design Verification, DFT (Design for Testability), AI Automation for Semiconductors, and RTL Engineering. Each service must have: summary, key capabilities, typical deliverables, and engagement model teaser (e.g., flexible teams).

Create a Products page that prominently displays the placeholder message: "Stay Tuned for the product" and includes a clean layout that supports adding product cards later (without implementing products now).

Create a Why Us page with strong, well-presented value propositions relevant to a VLSI services company (e.g., quality, signoff rigor, turnaround, security, domain expertise, scalable teams) and include proof-style sections (process, quality approach, engagement, tooling familiarity) using clear visual hierarchy.

Build a Careers page with a unique, modern interface that supports: (1) a jobs list, (2) a job detail view, and (3) an easy application flow. Each job must display: Job Description, Responsibilities, Pay, and Job ID.

Add a Contact page with a contact form (name, email, company, message) and a company contact section (email/phone/address placeholders). Form submissions must be stored in the backend for retrieval (admin/dev use).
Implement smooth, modern page transitions and section reveal animations across the site, ensuring performance-friendly motion and accessible reduced-motion behavior.

Add and use a coherent, distinctive visual theme (colors, typography, spacing, components) appropriate for a semiconductor/VLSI engineering brand; apply consistently across all pages and components. Avoid a generic look and avoid default blue/purple-heavy palettes unless required by the provided logo.

Generate and include high-quality static visual assets (illustrations/patterns/icons) aligned to VLSI/semiconductor themes and place them in frontend/public/assets/generated. Use these assets across Home, Services, Why Us, and Careers pages.

Prepare the project for custom domain connection to the GoDaddy-registered domain (glitchip.in) by including the Internet Computer custom domain well-known file (/.well-known/ic-domains) and documenting the DNS records needed for Cloudflare-based DNS management.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create new Glitchip Technologies Pvt. Ltd. website modeled after andgatetech.com structure with modern design and clear content
Add global site navigation: best-in-class header and footer across all main and subpages
Build Home page with attractive, relevant images and crystal-clear descriptions
Build Services pages/section for Physical Design, Design Verification, DFT, AI Automation for Semiconductors, and RTL Engineering
Build Products page/section with placeholder messaging: "Stay Tuned for the product"
Build Careers page with unique UI and easy application flow including Job Description, Responsibilities, Pay, and Job ID fields
Build "Why Us" page/section with strong, well-presented company value propositions
Implement good transitions/animations across pages and include high-quality design assets
Use provided company logo throughout the site branding
Plan deployment and connect the rebuilt site to the existing GoDaddy-registered domain (glitchip.in), likely via Cloudflare DNS

Implement backend storage and APIs for Careers: maintain a set of job postings (seeded with sample roles) and accept job applications (name, email, phone, resume link/attachment placeholder text, optional message, and the Job ID). Provide query methods for listing jobs, getting a job by Job ID, and listing applications (admin/dev use).
